input_args.passage: 'Wong Jing | Wong Yat-cheong, better known by his stage name as Wong Jing or Barry Wong, is a Hong Kong film director, producer, actor, presenter, and screenwriter.'
input_args.claim: 'Source provides additional details, stating that his real name is Wong Yat-cheong and that he is not only a film director but also a producer, actor, presenter, and screenwriter.'
